text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide ndhm.in

FHIRImplementationGuideforABDM

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://nrces.in/ndhm/fhir/r4/ImplementationGuide/ndhm.in

name: FHIRImplementationGuideforABDM
title: FHIR Implementation Guide for ABDM
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

contact.name: National Resource Center for EHR Standards

resource.name: Adjudication Reason
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes to captures reasons associated with adjudication of each Product/service while claim processing.

resource.name: Adjudication Reason
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains code to captures reasons associated with adjudication of each items while claim processing.

resource.name: Alcohol Drinking Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the AllergyIntolerance resource to record, search, and fetch allergies/adverse reactions associated with a patient.

resource.name: Appointment
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Appointment resource to searching for and fetching information about a booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s), and/or device(s) for a specific date/time for a patient.

resource.name: Benefit Category
resource.description: This Valueset includes a collection of SNOMEDCT codes related to BenefitCategory.

resource.name: Benefit Type
resource.description: This ValueSet includes a collection of codes that can be used to categorize the type of benefits provided by an insurance.

resource.name: Benefit Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem includes a collection of codes that can be used to categorize the type of benefits provided by an insurance.

resource.name: Billing Code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the billing of various charges or services provided in healthcare workflows.

resource.name: Binary
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Binary resource to searching for and fetching the data of a single raw artifact as digital content accessible in its native format of a patient.

resource.name: Body Measurement
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Body Measurement

resource.name: BrandName
resource.description: This extension sets minimum expectations for the Brandname element to searching for and fetching a Brandname associated with vaccine.

resource.name: Care Team Qualification
resource.description: This valueset comprises codes that represent credentials or specializations of healthcare practitioners.

resource.name: Care Team Role
resource.description: This valueset comprises codes that represent various roles within a care team.

resource.name: CarePlan
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the CarePlan resource to record, search, and fetch assessment and plan of treatment data associated with a patient.

resource.name: ChargeItem
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum expectations for the ChargeItem resource in order to store various details about the items under invoice which are being charged.

resource.name: ChargeItem Type
resource.description: This Valueset contains codes that represent the various types of items being charged for in invoice.

resource.name: Claim
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the providers and payors, insurers, to exchange the financial information, and supporting clinical information.

resource.name: Claim Exclusion
resource.description: This ValueSet comprises codes that describes excluded coverage within a health insurance product.

resource.name: Claim Exclusion
resource.description: This CodeSystem comprises codes that describes excluded coverage within a health insurance product.

resource.name: Claim Type
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to state the type of Claim.

resource.name: ClaimBundle
resource.description: The profile is based on a Bundle of type collection, where all the supporting information required for processing claim can be shared. Multiple entries can be added in a bundle to provide information like financial, clinical, provision of health care services with payors and for reporting to regulatory bodies and firms which provide data analytics. The bundle can be generated depending on the nature of the request defined by 'use' element in a claim resource, like preauthorization, predetermination and claim and can be shared over NHCX ecosystem.

resource.name: ClaimCondition
resource.description: This extension outlines specific conditions and criteria that may be required to successfully claim benefits under a coverage within a insurance plan.

resource.name: ClaimExclusion
resource.description: This extension specifies excluded coverage details within a health insurance product. It outlines services, treatments or conditions not covered.

resource.name: ClaimResponse
resource.description: This profile represents application level adjudication outcomes, or an application level error, that occur as a result of processing a supplied Claim resource, which could be a functional corollary of a Claim, Predetermination, or Preauthorization.

resource.name: ClaimResponseBundle
resource.description: The profile is based on a Bundle of type collection, where adjudicated response to a Claim, Predetermination or Preauthorization related  information is carried. Multiple entries included in a bundle carries the information and provides application level adjudication results.

resource.name: ClaimSupportingInfoRequirement
resource.description: This extension enumerates essential documentation necessary for a health insurance product. It provides a comprehensive list of documents such as identification proofs or medical records needed during the claims process.

resource.name: Communication
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum requirement for documenting any communication, whether it is planned or unsuccessful. A communication refers to the exchange of information from a sender to a receiver, and these entities can encompass patients, practitioners, related individuals, organizations, or devices. The resource serves as a record of these interactions.

resource.name: CommunicationRequest
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum requirement for a communication to be carried out, serving as a record of the communication request. In this context, a communication refers to the transmission of information from a sender to a receiver. The requester initiates the communication by asking the sender to convey the payload to the intended recipient. The sender and receivers involved in this process can encompass patients, practitioners, related persons, organizations, and devices.

resource.name: Condition
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Condition resource to record, search, and fetch a list of conditions associated with a patient.

resource.name: Coverage
resource.description: This profile aims to capture essential identifiers and descriptors of an insurance plan through the Coverage resource. It encompasses information that is typically found on an insurance card and can be utilized to cover the costs, either partially or entirely, for healthcare products and services.

resource.name: Coverage Type
resource.description: This ValueSet consists of a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the insurance coverage type.

resource.name: Coverage Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem consists of a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the insurance coverage type.

resource.name: CoverageEligibilityRequest
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for  CoverageEligibilityRequest to provide patient and insurance coverage information to an insurer for them to respond, in the form of an CoverageEligibilityResponse, with information regarding whether the stated coverage is valid and in-force and optionally to provide the insurance details of the policy.

resource.name: CoverageEligibilityRequestBundle
resource.description: The profile is based on a Bundle of type collection, where all the information required to process Coverage Eligibility Request can be shared. Depending on the  purpose of the request like validation, discovery,auth-requirement and benefit data can be included in the entries of a bundle.

resource.name: CoverageEligibilityResponse
resource.description: This profile provides eligibility and plan details from the processing of an CoverageEligibilityRequest resource.

resource.name: CoverageEligibilityResponseBundle
resource.description: The Coverage Eligibility Response Bundle is a Bundle profile with type collection. The bundle profile provides the response and plan details from the processing of an CoverageEligibilityRequest resource.

resource.name: Diagnosis Use
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Diagnosis type

resource.name: Diagnostic Report Type
resource.description: The Diagnostic Report Type Value Set is a set of types supported for Diagnostic Reports and notes.

resource.name: Diagnostic Type
resource.description: This valueset contains codes that represent the various types of diagnoses.

resource.name: DiagnosticReportImaging
resource.description: This profile represents the set of information related to the Imaging diagnosis report generated by imaging services like Radiology, Cardiology, Endoscopy, etc. are ordered for the patient.

resource.name: DiagnosticReportLab
resource.description: This profile represents the set of information related to the Laboratory diagnosis report generated by the laboratory services like Complete Blood Count, Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid Panel, Urinalysis, etc. are ordered for the patient.

resource.name: DiagnosticReportRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents diagnostic reports including Radiology and Laboratory reports that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: Diet Type
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to Dietary finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: DischargeSummaryRecord
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent the discharge summary record for ABDM HDE data set.

resource.name: DocumentBundle
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the DocumentBundle that includes all resources into a single instance with containing context to act as an exchangeable clinical document.

resource.name: DocumentReference
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for searching and fetching patient documents including the Clinical Notes using the DocumentReference resource.

resource.name: Encounter
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Encounter resource to record, search, and fetch basic encounter information for an individual patient.

resource.name: EncounterTypes
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT

resource.name: FamilyMemberHistory
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the FamilyMemberHistory resource for searching and fetching significant health conditions of a person related to the patient in the context of care.

resource.name: Form Code
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes which specify type of document attached with as form.

resource.name: Form Code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains codes which specify type of document attached with as form.

resource.name: General Assessment
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC and SNOMED CT Codes for General Assessment

resource.name: General Wellbeing
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of General well-being finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: HealthDocumentRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the unstructured historical health records as a single of multiple Health Record Documents generally uploaded by the patients through the Health Locker and can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: ICD10 Diagnostic codes
resource.description: This valueset consists of codes that represent ICD-10 Diagnostic codes.

resource.name: Identifier Type
resource.description: This Valueset contains coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose

resource.name: Identifier Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose

resource.name: ImagingStudy
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ImagingStudy resource to searching for and fetching the content produced in a DICOM imaging study.

resource.name: Immunization
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Immunization resource to record, fetch and search immunization history associated with a patient.

resource.name: ImmunizationRecommendation
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ImmunizationRecommendation resource to support the next immunization to be taken by the patient.

resource.name: ImmunizationRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the Immunization records with any additional documents such as vaccine certificate, the next immunization recommendations, etc. This can be further shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: InsurancePlan
resource.description:
InsurancePlan represents the product that can be offered to the customer. It describes a health insurance offering comprised of a list of covered benefits (i.e. the product), costs associated with those benefits (i.e. the plan), and additional information about the offering. It provides the details of a contractual arrangement between an individual or entity (the policyholder) and an insurance provider.
A plan describes the Health coverage issued to you directly (individual plan) or through an employer, union, or other group sponsor (employer group plan) that provides coverage for certain health care costs. It pairs the health insurance coverage benefits under a product with the particular cost sharing structure offered to a consumer.

resource.name: InsurancePlan Type
resource.description: The Valueset comprises codes employed for categorizing different Insurance product. It is created by referring the Health Insurance Data Reporting Manual provided by the Insurance Information Bureau of India (IIB). For more information, visit IIB's official website: https://iib.gov.in or access the manual directly at: https://healthapp.iib.gov.in/IIB/datamanuals/hidmanual08.pdf.

resource.name: InsurancePlan Type
resource.description: The Valueset comprises codes employed for categorizing different Insurance product. It is created by referring the Health Insurance Data Reporting Manual provided by the Insurance Information Bureau of India (IIB). For more information, visit IIB's official website: https://iib.gov.in or access the manual directly at: https://healthapp.iib.gov.in/IIB/datamanuals/hidmanual08.pdf.

resource.name: InsurancePlanBundle
resource.description: This profile is based on a Bundle of type collection, providing a description of a health insurance package that consists of a comprehensive list of covered benefits (referred to as the product), associated costs (known as the plan), and supplementary details regarding the offering, such as ownership and administration, coverage area, contact information, and more.

resource.name: Invoice
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum expectations for the details to be added in order to generate invoices for various healthcare process or workflows.

resource.name: Invoice Type
resource.description: This Valueset contains codes that represent the various types of invoices.

resource.name: InvoiceRecord
resource.description: The billing artifact represents the invoice details such as pharmacy invoice, consultation invoice etc. along with the support for scanned documents attached for the patient which can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: Lifestyle
resource.description: This value set covers SNOMEDCT Codes for type of Lifestyle

resource.name: Location-example-01
resource.description: Second floor of the Old South Wing, formerly in use by Psychiatry

resource.name: Location-example-03
resource.description: Second floor of the Old South Wing, formerly in use by Psychiatry

resource.name: Media
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Media resource to searching for and fetching media like a photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare, associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: Medication
resource.description: This profile sets the minimum expectations for the medication resource in order to store various details about a given medicine.

resource.name: MedicationRequest
resource.description: The MedicationRequest resource can be used to record a patients medication prescription or order. This profile sets minimum expectations for the MedicationRequest resource to record, search, and fetch medications associated with a patient.

resource.name: MedicationStatement
resource.description: The MedicationStatement resource can be used to record a patients medication information. It is used to record the information about the medications consumed by the patient in the past, present, or future.

resource.name: Medicine Codes
resource.description: This Value Set covers: Clinical Drugs from SNOMED CT International Edition, Clinical Drugs and Branded Medicines (Real Clinical Drugs) from Common Drug Codes for India (National Extension). For more information refer: [https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases](https://www.nrces.in/services/national-releases)

resource.name: Mental Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to Emotional state finding (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Observation
resource.description: Observation resource represents an individual laboratory test and result value, a nested panel (such as a microbial susceptibility panel) which references other observations, or rarely a laboratory test with component result values. This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation resource to record, search, and fetch laboratory test results associated with a patient.

resource.name: ObservationBodyMeasurement
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationBodyMeasurement to record, search, and fetch the details of the body measurements of the patient.

resource.name: ObservationGeneralAssessment
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationGeneralAssessment to record, search, and fetch the details of the general health assessment of a patient.

resource.name: ObservationLifestyle
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationLifestyle to record, search, and fetch the details of the lifestyle of the patient.

resource.name: ObservationPhysicalActivity
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationPhysicalActivity to record, search, and fetch the details of the physical activities of a patient.

resource.name: ObservationVitalSigns
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ObservationVitalSigns to record, search, and fetch the details of the vital signs of a patient.

resource.name: ObservationWomenHealth
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for ObservationWomenHealth to record, search, and fetch the details of womens health.

resource.name: OPConsultRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the outpatient visit consultation note which may include clinical information on any OP examinations, procedures along with medication administered, and advice that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: Organization
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Organization resource to searching for and fetching an Organization associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: Patient
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Patient resource to record, search, and fetch basic demographics and other administrative information about an individual patient.

resource.name: Payment Type
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of payment

resource.name: Payment Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of payment.

resource.name: PaymentNotice
resource.description: This resource provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.

resource.name: PaymentReconciliation
resource.description: This profile provides the bulk payment details associated with a payment for goods and services rendered by a provider to patients covered by insurance plans offered by that payor.

resource.name: Physical Activity
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Physical Activity

resource.name: Plan Type
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the type of insurance plans.

resource.name: Plan Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the type of insurance plans.

resource.name: Practitioner
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Practitioner resource to record, search, and fetch basic demographics and other administrative information about an individual practitioner.

resource.name: Practitioner Role
resource.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of a Practitioner.

resource.name: PractitionerRole
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the PractitionerRole resource to record, search, and fetch the practitioner role for a practitioner.

resource.name: PrescriptionRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents the medication advice to the patient in compliance with the Pharmacy Council of India (PCI) guidelines, which can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: Price Component
resource.description: This Valueset contains codes that represent the components for price of item.

resource.name: Price Component
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to categorize the price of item into various components.

resource.name: Procedure
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Procedure resource to record, search, and fetch procedures associated with a patient.

resource.name: ProductorService
resource.description: This value set includes codes for product or service from SNOMEDCT

resource.name: Program Code
resource.description: This Valueset contains set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

resource.name: Program Code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties

resource.name: Reason Code
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes to captures reasons associated with task processing.

resource.name: Reason Code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains codes to captures reasons associated with task processing.

resource.name: Related Claim Relationship
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be use to show the relationship between claims.

resource.name: Related Claim Relationship
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be use to show the relationship between claims.

resource.name: Route Of Administration
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Route Of Administration

resource.name: ServiceRequest
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the ServiceRequest resource to searching for and fetching information about services like a request for a procedure or diagnostic or other services to be planned, proposed, or performed associated with a patient or provider.

resource.name: Specimen
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Specimen resource to searching for and fetching information regarding a sample to be used for the analysis of a patient.

resource.name: Specimen Types
resource.description: This value set contains a set of SNOMED CT codes for Specimen Types

resource.name: SupportingInfo Category
resource.description: This Valueset contains classification of the information supplied for the processing of different workflows like claims etc.

resource.name: SupportingInfo Category
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains classification of the information supplied for the processing of different workflows like claims etc.

resource.name: SupportingInfo Code
resource.description: This Valueset contains code pertaining to the specific information mentioned with the category of supporting info.

resource.name: SupportingInfo code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains code pertaining to the specific information mentioned with the category of supporting info

resource.name: Task
resource.description: This profile describes an activity that can be performed and tracks the state of completion of that activity. It is a representation that an activity should be or has been initiated, and eventually, represents the successful or unsuccessful completion of that activity.

resource.name: Task Code
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the task involved

resource.name: Task Code
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the task involved

resource.name: Task Input Type
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of input in the task resource

resource.name: Task Input Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of input in the task resource

resource.name: Task Output Type
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of output in the task resource

resource.name: Task Output Type
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the type of output in the task resource

resource.name: Task Output Value
resource.description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the value of output in the task resource

resource.name: Task Output Value
resource.description: This CodeSystem contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the Value of output in the task resource

resource.name: TaskBundle
resource.description: This profile is based on a Bundle of type collection, incorporating the Task resource to convey the information related to payments, status checks during claim adjudication, reprocessing claims, and facilitating the request or transmission of any supporting documentation as needed.

resource.name: Tobacco Chewing Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of Finding relating to tobacco chewing of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Tobacco Smoking Status
resource.description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of Finding relating to tobacco smoking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Vaccine Codes
resource.description: This value set covers : All leaf nodes (preferred term) of children of Vaccine product containing bacteria antigen (medicinal product) and Vaccine product containing virus antigen (medicinal product) of the SNOMED CT

resource.name: Vital Signs
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Vital Signs

resource.name: WellnessRecord
resource.description: The Clinical Artifact represents regular wellness information of patients typically through the Patient Health Record (PHR) application covering clinical information such as vitals, physical examination, general wellness, women wellness, etc., that can be shared across the health ecosystem.

resource.name: Women Health
resource.description: This value set covers LOINC Codes for Women Health
